title: Frames messing up/ being weird dropping
body: Not sure if I'm the only person this is happening to, but it slowly got worse and choppy and couldn't play dropping to 8 fps later on and then I restart the game and then ran smoothly 100+, but I capped it to 60 after I seen there was no issue.

replies.body: Has your FPS been having that problem still after you capped it out? If so I would go ahead and check for any driver or directx updates just in case you might have missed one recently, but definitely feel free to hit me back up in a reply if you're still having problems.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1I88E2ol,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-02T22:39:07.417+0000)
>
> Has your FPS been having that problem still after you capped it out? If so I would go ahead and check for any driver or directx updates just in case you might have missed one recently, but definitely feel free to hit me back up in a reply if you're still having problems.

I updated drivers and everything, but around 35 mins I start to lose fps

Hmmmm strange. There might still be something blocking those drivers from working correctly, but I'm not 100% sure how to get that fixed up myself from here on the boards. Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some of your game logs and they'll be able to take a closer look.
